content: 1999 Singaporean film ***Eating Air*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 吃風) is a 1999 Singaporean [action](/wiki/Action_film) [romantic drama film](/wiki/Romantic_drama_film) directed by [Kelvin Tong](/wiki/Kelvin_Tong) and [Jasmine Ng](/wiki/Jasmine_Ng), starring [Benjamin Heng](/wiki/Benjamin_Heng) and Alvina Toh as two disaffected teenagers who are in love and about their days of being wild and crazy. Billed as "a motorcycle kung-fu love story", the directorial feature debut of Tong and Ng has since been considered a [cult classic](/wiki/Cult_film) among the local film community. ## Synopsis A young man loves spending his time cruising the streets on his motorcycle and imagines himself as a martial arts hero. He falls in love with a quiet, withdrawn student who works in a photocopy shop by day and sells newspapers with her mother at night. The young man's carefree life changes when his best friend gets into trouble with the underworld triads and he feels obligated to shoulder the responsibilities with him. ## Cast - [Benjamin Heng](/wiki/Benjamin_Heng) as Ah Boy - Alvina Toh as Ah Girl - Joseph Cheong as Ah Gu - Ferris Yeo as Chao Helang - Andy Chng as Aw Tau - [Mark Lee](/wiki/Mark_Lee_(Singaporean_actor)) as Lao Beng - [Michelle Chong](/wiki/Michelle_Chong) as Posche - Deborah Png as Ah Girl's mother - [Kit Chan](/wiki/Kit_Chan) as Mysterious girl ## Awards and nominations YearAwardsCategoryRecipientResultRef.2000[Singapore International Film Festival](/wiki/Singapore_International_Film_Festival)Young Cinema Award[Kelvin Tong](/wiki/Kelvin_Tong) and [Jasmine Ng](/wiki/Jasmine_Ng)Won - *Eating Air* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This article about a 1990s romantic drama film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Eating Air
